messages.content: Hi, I have to report an emergency.
My guardian got into an argument and there was a shot fired at 634 Gauge Avenue.
Okay, where's your friend, the one that got shot?
That's my father. He's in the house, okay? It wasn't my mom's fault. She was defending herself.
So your mom shot your father, is that what you're saying?
She's upstairs. She's crying. I told her.
Okay, that's fine. Where's the gun?
The gun is on the floor upstairs.
Okay. Please stay on the line. What apartment are you in?
The cops are here. Can you please hurry?
I will. The cops are already here. Please hurry.
